General.Name: Jiangsu Tianmu Lake Tourism Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Tianmu Lake Tourism Co.,Ltd. operates a tourism resort in China. Its resort has three sightseeing and leisure facilities with hotel and food facilities under the names of Tianmu Lake Landscape Park Scenic Spot, Tianmu Lake Nanshan Bamboo Sea Scenic Spot, and Tianmu Lake Yushui Hot Spring. The company also engages in cableway transportation; agriculture; hot spring bath service, catering, and accommodation activities; and provision of travel, rehabilitation, and training services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Liyang, China.
General.Address: Tianmu Lake Tourism Resort, Liyang, China, 213333
